businessProfile.name: Melty
businessProfile.address: 2851 W Club House Dr #175, Lehi, UT 84043, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 2851 W Club House Dr #175, Lehi, UT 84043, USA

reviews.text: Absolutely loved our visit to Melty‚Äôs! As a current Texan who grew up in Utah, this place brought back all the right flavors with a fresh twist. Nestled near the beautiful Thanksgiving tulip gardens, it truly feels like a hidden gem worth discovering. Every bite‚Äîfrom the perfectly crafted sandwiches to the flavorful sauces and delicious sides‚Äîwas spot on. You can taste the care and quality in everything they serve. This spot has officially become a must-stop every time we visit. Five stars all around‚Äîwell done, Melty‚Äôs!
Got the soup dipper and was perfect amount for sandwich. Grilled cheese hit the spot like only grilled cheese can when you are craving one. Service was good. Establishment was clean. Would return.

I got the brisket sandwich and it was really good, but I did expect there to be significantly more cheese. The cheese fries and the cheese goods were also good, but nothing to write home about. Overall, the food was good but after tip we spent $42 between 2 people and that feels incredibly overpriced for a sandwich, a side and a medium drink, so I'm not sure I would go back for that reason alone.

I enjoyed the food here, it was tasty toasted bread. I also really appreciated the service that Denise gave. She was super nice at the register and brought me out my food (I was outside) even though I had a little divice that would ring when I needed to go get it. It was very nice of her. I think the sides are a little pricey, but the sandwiches are well priced and really good.

My son convinced me to go to Melty with him for dinner because he loves it and eats there all the time. Not only was I not disappointed, I was blown away by the delicious food. Do not be dissuaded because it's connected to a gas station. They have so many great varieties of grilled cheese, it was hard to decide what to get. I settled on the BBQ brisket, and it was an excellent choice. The meat was so tender and loaded with plenty of gooey cheese. The bread was toasted to perfection. My son gave me a bite of his French dip, and it was just as good. For the side, I ordered the mac 'n' cheese, and it was possibly the best I've ever had, including the stuff I lovingly make at home on the smoker. Convinced yet? Just go!

recentReviews.text: High quality food, great options, and amazing service. Denise was so nice and helpful!

I enjoyed the food here, it was tasty toasted bread. I also really appreciated the service that Denise gave. She was super nice at the register and brought me out my food (I was outside) even though I had a little divice that would ring when I needed to go get it. It was very nice of her. I think the sides are a little pricey, but the sandwiches are well priced and really good.
I had a great time here for my first time dining. I was helped by Denise. She was great and helped me get exactly what I wanted which was great! Definitely recommend this place and recommend Denise!

The best Gourmet Grilled Cheese Sandwiches I've ever had!!! The service was above and beyond and Denise was super nice to our entire family of 6! The BBQ brisket was unbelievably good! I had bites of my other family members food and everything was "Melty in your Mouthy" amazingness!
I wish a Melty would open in St. George, UT!

detailedReviews.author: BKnudsen5
detailedReviews.text: High quality food, great options, and amazing service. Denise was so nice and helpful!

detailedReviews.author: Bryce Stillwell
detailedReviews.text: I enjoyed the food here, it was tasty toasted bread. I also really appreciated the service that Denise gave. She was super nice at the register and brought me out my food (I was outside) even though I had a little divice that would ring when I needed to go get it. It was very nice of her. I think the sides are a little pricey, but the sandwiches are well priced and really good.

detailedReviews.author: Payton Raymond
detailedReviews.text: I had a great time here for my first time dining. I was helped by Denise. She was great and helped me get exactly what I wanted which was great! Definitely recommend this place and recommend Denise!

detailedReviews.author: David Phillips
detailedReviews.text:
The best Gourmet Grilled Cheese Sandwiches I've ever had!!! The service was above and beyond and Denise was super nice to our entire family of 6! The BBQ brisket was unbelievably good! I had bites of my other family members food and everything was "Melty in your Mouthy" amazingness!
I wish a Melty would open in St. George, UT!

detailedReviews.author: Jeremiah Washburn
detailedReviews.text: Michelle is so great! The food is amazing and the service is just as good as the food!

detailedReviews.author: James Stevenson
detailedReviews.text:
First time trying Melty at the Lehi location while staying nearby. We came in Saturday night around 8:40pm after seeing nachos on the Google Maps photo menu‚Äîonly to find out they don‚Äôt actually serve nachos. Ended up ordering the Club Melt and the Turkey Avocado Melt, both as meal combos. The Club Melt was fantastic‚Äîthe mayo aioli really stood out. The Turkey Avocado Melt was decent, but not as flavorful.

We also added loaded fries, loaded tots, and a small mac & cheese. The bill for two came to $46, which felt pricey considering the portion sizes. The sides were especially underwhelming‚Äîvery small portions, and the ‚Äúcheese‚Äù topping tasted more like sauce with bacon crumbles and chives sprinkled on. The mac & cheese was okay but not worth $6 for such a small cup.

The sandwiches were a bit greasy coming out of the bag‚Äîbut that‚Äôs expected with grilled cheese. Overall, the Club Melt was the highlight, but the sides and pricing left us disappointed.

detailedReviews.author: abbey jones
detailedReviews.text:
I normally don‚Äôt leave bad reviews, but I had a really disappointing experience at Melty. The food itself might be good, but the service I received ruined my visit. One of the employees, a male with dark grey hair, was extremely rude and disrespectful toward me. Instead of being welcoming or helpful, his attitude came across as dismissive and unprofessional, which made me feel very uncomfortable as a customer.

A place like this should pride itself not only on the food but also on the way they treat people, and unfortunately, that was completely lacking during my visit. I won‚Äôt be coming back, and I hope management takes this feedback seriously because no one should be treated that way when they‚Äôre just trying to enjoy a meal.

detailedReviews.author: Robyn Johnson
detailedReviews.text:
I came in with my grand kids for unbelievably good grilled cheese sandwiches.  Meltys did not disappoint!
Denice was fabulous, friendly and helpful!
We will be back!

detailedReviews.author: Diantra' Landry
detailedReviews.text: I love a good slogan just as much as the next person so when Melty say "We melt it, you love it" they mean it. Never been to restaurant such as this but I'm sure glad I decided to try it out. Was put into the most welcomed food coma after having the French Dip Melt which was chefs kiss especially with the Au Jus. The side of cheese curds made for a cheese filled delicious meal (take the recommendation and get the curds with the jalapeno jelly and thank me later). I will be back to try another sandwich.

detailedReviews.author: Conley Strom
detailedReviews.text: Amazing food and great and friendly staff

detailedReviews.author: Bryan Corzo (Bluigi)
detailedReviews.text: Cheese was not melty

detailedReviews.author: Stephen Horton
detailedReviews.text: Thank you Denise! She was so nice and made it feel like we were at home. Amazing sandwiches, thank you Melty for a great meal. Favorite has to be the four cheese with the tomato basil dip. Amazing!

detailedReviews.author: Sean Peck
detailedReviews.text: This is comfort food to the max.

detailedReviews.author: Becca V.
detailedReviews.text: Delicious food and a huge variety of sandwiches! Great service- the employee even offered my screaming toddler a paper and colored pencils to try and calm him down! Don‚Äôt forget to get a sauce with your sandwich. I got the melty sauce with my melty club and it was yummy! There are a few sauce options- the jalape√±o jelly was delicious with the cheese curds. Would love to try some more of their sandwiches!

detailedReviews.author: Matt Stringham
detailedReviews.text: Shelly needs a raise.  Watched her hold the fort down by herself.  Like 30 orders.  Positive attitude and timely.

detailedReviews.author: Taylor Nickel
detailedReviews.text: Food is solid. Be prepared to wait FOREVER (like 30 min) to get it though, which is why I‚Äôm knocking off a couple of stars.

detailedReviews.author: Xavier jose Vasquez Salazar
detailedReviews.text: Siempre se tardan demasiado para entregar la comida

detailedReviews.author: Penny Kidd (Pennywise Coaching)
detailedReviews.text: I‚Äôm glad we stopped in after a few hours at Thanksgiving Point. My only disappointment was online it showed artichoke and it wasn‚Äôt available in store. Yummy change of pace. We shared a meal and it was $17

detailedReviews.author: Kim Ekins
detailedReviews.text: We have been twice and it was excellent both times. Denise and Mike are fabulous! I highly recommend this restaurant.

detailedReviews.author: Sean Vester
detailedReviews.text: Stopping through town on a road trip and we happened to see Melty right down the street from our hotel, conveniently located near hotels and freeway. I have the type of kids that only eat chicken fingers or grilled cheese at every restaurant I take them to so this was a no-brainer. We walked in about 30 mins before they closed but were still greeted warmly by Denise and Michael. The sandwiches were grilled to perfection and it was the perfect combo of salty and savory. We had the ham and cheese, French dip and the 4 cheese classics with tots. All of it was perfect. Nothing beats a crispy tot‚Ä¶ and these are a 10/10. Need some good comfort food? Look no further!

detailedReviews.author: Cam P
detailedReviews.text: Visited for the first time and had a nice experience. The staff were very helpful, patient with me ordering for 4 young kids, and got us the food pretty quickly. The food was delicious! I felt like needing to pay extra for additional sauces was a little unnecessary, which I did to try them. I probably won‚Äôt pay for extras next time, but they were pretty tasty.

detailedReviews.author: Heather powell
detailedReviews.text: Got the soup dipper and was perfect amount for sandwich. Grilled cheese hit the spot like only grilled cheese can when you are craving one. Service was good. Establishment was clean. Would return.

detailedReviews.author: Tyran Heaton
detailedReviews.text: The service was excellent. The food was good.

detailedReviews.author: Scott M. Stringham
detailedReviews.text: My son convinced me to go to Melty with him for dinner because he loves it and eats there all the time. Not only was I not disappointed, I was blown away by the delicious food. Do not be dissuaded because it's connected to a gas station. They have so many great varieties of grilled cheese, it was hard to decide what to get. I settled on the BBQ brisket, and it was an excellent choice. The meat was so tender and loaded with plenty of gooey cheese. The bread was toasted to perfection. My son gave me a bite of his French dip, and it was just as good. For the side, I ordered the mac 'n' cheese, and it was possibly the best I've ever had, including the stuff I lovingly make at home on the smoker. Convinced yet? Just go!

detailedReviews.author: Gena Avelar
detailedReviews.text: Great place first time eating here. The service was great Denise, Michael, and Mikey were very helpful and attentive. The went above and beyond to make us feel welcome and made sure we had a great experience. Place was very clean and friendly environment.

detailedReviews.author: Kaylia Lundgren
detailedReviews.text: Seriously the nicest servers we have ever met. The best experience we‚Äôve had in a long time. We asked for recommendations and they immediately had great ones. They were super attentive and made sure we had everything we needed. The food was great and felt homey! Loved it

detailedReviews.author: Jason Richardson
detailedReviews.text: Decent food sloooooow to make. 45 minute wait for food

detailedReviews.author: Seth Doddridge
detailedReviews.text: Best grilled cheese of all time, the chicken parmesan is goated and it's for a good price too. Beware of getting addicted to this place.

detailedReviews.author: P. Richard
detailedReviews.text:
Came in with my family. Staff was super friendly and attentive. Took our very large order and didn't complain. Food arrived promptly. Denise made us feel like super heroes. And the food was great! Tasted like good diner melts for a reasonable price.

10 out of 10

detailedReviews.author: Schenker Fox
detailedReviews.text: Food was great, and the service was even better.

detailedReviews.author: Luke Francis
detailedReviews.text: First time at Melty! Denise was the best! Super friendly. She thought we were on our honeymoon hahaha. Got the brisket sandwich‚Ä¶ GOATED‚Ä¶. Cheese was MELTY, bread could use an upgrade. 10/10 would recommend. Can‚Äôt wait to come back!

detailedReviews.author: Debra Whitney
detailedReviews.text: The employee who helped me was super nice! The food is always good!

detailedReviews.author: Jerid Boutet
detailedReviews.text: I ordered a turkey & bacon melt and tater tots. The  sandwich was definitely tasty however for a place named Melty there was no ‚Äúmelt‚Äù. The cheese wasn‚Äôt melted nor was there a whole lot like you would expect based on the photos. The food was hot and the tater tots were delicious but overall the portion was really poor. The sandwich was very small. I‚Äôd go back in a pinch but I‚Äôd probably opt out for other area restaurants based on how small the food was for the price.

detailedReviews.author: A M
detailedReviews.text: Staff was super polite and knowledgeable. They gave great recommendations and took care of us quickly. The food came out hot and delicious! 10/10 would come again!

detailedReviews.author: K2K Orem
detailedReviews.text: Good food, great service, pleasant atmosphere

detailedReviews.author: Brian Brown
detailedReviews.text: Always money, staff has recommendations and they‚Äôre fast and order is always right.

detailedReviews.author: Kirstin Norman
detailedReviews.text: First and last time ordering here. The place was dead when we entered and I ordered on the kiosk. When our food came out, I asked for the large soda cup I had paid for, but the staff member insisted I was incorrect. He got very rude, insisting there was no way he was wrong. He snarkily said, ‚ÄúI can reprint the receipt for you if you‚Äôd like‚Äù and I said yes, please. Lo and behold, I was correct. He blustered a lot about how it didn‚Äôt show up on his screen and finally gave me the cup, but no apology.  We won‚Äôt be back.

detailedReviews.author: Brian Drake
detailedReviews.text: Stumbled onto this place while looking on maps for a place to eat and my girlfriend and I knew we had to try it. The sandwiches were delicious and fair priced. The employees were quick and kind. And the restaurant was clean and easy to access. All in all a great experience, we are already looking forward to our next visit, cannot reccomend Melty enough!

detailedReviews.author: Tanner Wixom
detailedReviews.text:
My son and I tried Melty out without knowing anything about it beforehand. We just found it on Google Maps when we were looking for a place to eat. So, without any real expectations, we ordered a couple different grilled cheese sandwiches: the 4 cheese classic and the pizza melt. Both of them were absolutely delicious! The restaurant had a nice vibe and we were able to find a quiet corner to chat while we ate. It was awesome!

Right before we were done, one of the workers offered us a couple of cookies on the house. So nice of them and completely unexpected! That‚Äôs the kind of experience that sticks with you. These folks are great and the food speaks for itself. We‚Äôll be back!

detailedReviews.author: Ethan Johnson
detailedReviews.text: They added chicken to my jalepeno popper sandwich and it was bussin

detailedReviews.author: Richard L'Esperance
detailedReviews.text: Came in-the door rang the bell. Waited five minutes at the front desk while the place was empty. The staff was in the back giggling about something. Nobody came to take my order. 5/23/25 2:25 pm

detailedReviews.author: Allison Jolley
detailedReviews.text: Food was ok. VERY greasy and the bread didn‚Äôt seem fresh. Staff just kept sitting around between customers which was kind of unprofessional IMO, my 7 year old son went to use the restroom and said it was so disgusting he couldn‚Äôt go (which is saying a lot from a kid his age). I had high hopes with the reviews but probably won‚Äôt come back unfortunately.

detailedReviews.author: Sienna Galvez
detailedReviews.text: Pretty yummy stuff. I got the mac n cheese and the melty club. Fresh, lots of cheese, just what I was hoping for to satisfy my cravings for something cheesey haha. The Mac had an unexpected but fun kick to it that made it stand out for sure, and just a good flavor and texture overall. Don't sleep on this place, it's gooooood!! Service was super quick too (but there was no line when I went).

detailedReviews.author: Lily star shine24 Blue butterfly24
detailedReviews.text: First time there in Lehi everything was definitely a good experience so thanks

detailedReviews.author: Limelight Trucking
detailedReviews.text: Fantastic food!!!! One of the best sandwiches I had in a long time

detailedReviews.author: Craig Morris
detailedReviews.text: Soooo good! Crazy lunch rush but they were friendly and calm‚Äîdefinitely going back!

detailedReviews.author: Dri S
detailedReviews.text: Yummy üòã brisket melt, tater tots delicious deal

detailedReviews.author: Heather Oxborrow
detailedReviews.text: First time visit and loved it! I got the caprese and would go back and get it again - the flavors were so good. The fries were good also.

detailedReviews.author: Sarah Barrett
detailedReviews.text: I got the brisket sandwich and it was really good, but I did expect there to be significantly more cheese. The cheese fries and the cheese goods were also good, but nothing to write home about. Overall, the food was good but after tip we spent $42 between 2 people and that feels incredibly overpriced for a sandwich, a side and a medium drink, so I'm not sure I would go back for that reason alone.

detailedReviews.author: Jacquie Peterson
detailedReviews.text: I've never ordered anything here I didn't like.  I especially enjoy getting tater tots.  They have lots of options for sides and the sauces are fun.  I need to try desserts next.

detailedReviews.author: Mary Fitch
detailedReviews.text: Absolutely loved our visit to Melty‚Äôs! As a current Texan who grew up in Utah, this place brought back all the right flavors with a fresh twist. Nestled near the beautiful Thanksgiving tulip gardens, it truly feels like a hidden gem worth discovering. Every bite‚Äîfrom the perfectly crafted sandwiches to the flavorful sauces and delicious sides‚Äîwas spot on. You can taste the care and quality in everything they serve. This spot has officially become a must-stop every time we visit. Five stars all around‚Äîwell done, Melty‚Äôs!

detailedReviews.author: Taft Smith
detailedReviews.text: So fireeee!! üî•

detailedReviews.author: Alan West
detailedReviews.text: Charged for loaded tots that I ordered they ran out of toppings for it and didn‚Äôt tell me when I picked it up then call to find out what the hell. Then they said knew and were going to leave a note and I could drive back and get the refund for the loaded tots portion of the tots. Patty melt burger was alright the brisket melt was a let down. Will not be going back

detailedReviews.author: Trevor G
detailedReviews.text: My co workers and I ordered food here and ordered loaded tots. When we picked it up and got back, we found just plan tots. We called them up and they said we could come back for a refund as they were out. If you are out, you should be telling the customer when they pick up or call them. The sandwich‚Äôs were okay but not worth $10. None of us will be returning as the advertisement vs what we got do not come even close. Very disappointed and I do not recommend.

detailedReviews.author: Cassidee DeWitt
detailedReviews.text: The staff was friendly and food tasted great!!

detailedReviews.author: Hunter Hatch
detailedReviews.text: Pretty good people nice

detailedReviews.author: Nate Muse
detailedReviews.text: Jason is the best and will take care of anything you need.

detailedReviews.author: abbey jones
detailedReviews.text: i seen them on tiktok the lehi one and the sandwich they made look so good i just had to go in and try the manger‚Äôs there are so nice they treated me like they care 100% worth of coming in and try it‚Äôs the best grilled cheese place ever

detailedReviews.author: Hayden Boulter
detailedReviews.text: First time eating here, my wife wanted funnel cake fries and they had them so we went for those and found are new favor spot.

detailedReviews.author: Eilaysha Metz
detailedReviews.text: Worth but spendy. Just under $50 for 2 lrg. Combos w/ the funnel cake fries- hence the 4 stars...Overall it's a cute simple straightforward food stop. The food was very tasty - the tator tots & funnel cake fries are amazing. The location is cute and small. The employees were sweet and patient.

detailedReviews.author: Victoria Perkins
detailedReviews.text: Specifically came here for the funnel cake fries, and was so happy with the food! We had the four cheese classic, bbq pulled pork, and the loaded fries! And the funnel cake fries were exactly what I was looking for, crunch outside and a chewy inside! Will definitely be returning!

detailedReviews.author: Heather Hansen
detailedReviews.text: Super polite staff! Menu options are great.

detailedReviews.author: Tom Baldwin
detailedReviews.text: Decided to try after hearing an add on the radio. So glad we did! Cuban was delicious and the tater tots were amazing! Crispy and delicious!

detailedReviews.author: Jeff Furniss
detailedReviews.text: People there were super friendly!  Food was great too!  Love a grilled cheese sandwich!!

detailedReviews.author: Glen Elliott
detailedReviews.text: Lots of options. And the taste was good too!

detailedReviews.author: Raul Mateos
detailedReviews.text: Great service!

detailedReviews.author: J M
detailedReviews.text: I was blown away with how good this place was.  Service was spectacular. Upon walking through the door we were welcomed and greeted with smiles. It was our first time at the restaurant, so the cashier recommended a couple sandwiches. We decided we would go with the chicken parm and the Cuban both in combos that came with tater tots and a drink.  We were not disappointed. The chicken parm had a good amount of a sauce with melty cheese and a fried chicken cutlet which covered the bread.  The sandwich also was not Wonder-bread small.  I was surprised that the sauce was not the overly sweet spaghetti sauce that most restaurants default to. It tasted true to an Italian restaurant.  The Cuban was amazing as well. There was smoked pork, ham, cheese, and pickles. It was better than the Cuban sandwich I had in Florida.  The toast was consistent on the bread and it was a nice golden brown. The tater tots were perfectly fried (crispy) and perfectly seasoned.Because my expectations were beyond met, we will definitely be back, and I won‚Äôt be surprised if I will return in my dreams as well, for the craveability factor is off the charts.

detailedReviews.author: Adam Jackson
detailedReviews.text: The food was excellent‚ÄîI ordered the BBQ brisket, and it was delicious. The service was fast, though the portions were a bit small for the price. Overall, it was a great experience!

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.4/5 rating from 100 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers consistently praise Denise and other staff for their exceptional, friendly service, making them feel welcomed and at home. - review management can highlight this positive aspect

The gourmet grilled cheese sandwiches, especially the BBQ brisket and French Dip Melt, are frequently described as "unbelievably good" and "melty in your mouthy," showcasing the unique and high-quality food offerings. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The restaurant's creative and delicious food options, like the cheese curds with jalapeno jelly, are highly appreciated by customers, encouraging repeat visits. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Long wait times for food - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Negative reviews and reputation issues related to service and portion sizes - review management can address this concern
Perception of high prices for portion sizes - social media marketing can improve this area

neutral.author: James Stevenson
neutral.text:
First time trying Melty at the Lehi location while staying nearby. We came in Saturday night around 8:40pm after seeing nachos on the Google Maps photo menu‚Äîonly to find out they don‚Äôt actually serve nachos. Ended up ordering the Club Melt and the Turkey Avocado Melt, both as meal combos. The Club Melt was fantastic‚Äîthe mayo aioli really stood out. The Turkey Avocado Melt was decent, but not as flavorful.

We also added loaded fries, loaded tots, and a small mac & cheese. The bill for two came to $46, which felt pricey considering the portion sizes. The sides were especially underwhelming‚Äîvery small portions, and the ‚Äúcheese‚Äù topping tasted more like sauce with bacon crumbles and chives sprinkled on. The mac & cheese was okay but not worth $6 for such a small cup.

The sandwiches were a bit greasy coming out of the bag‚Äîbut that‚Äôs expected with grilled cheese. Overall, the Club Melt was the highlight, but the sides and pricing left us disappointed.

neutral.author: Taylor Nickel
neutral.text: Food is solid. Be prepared to wait FOREVER (like 30 min) to get it though, which is why I‚Äôm knocking off a couple of stars.

neutral.author: Tyran Heaton
neutral.text: The service was excellent. The food was good.

negative.author: abbey jones
negative.text:
I normally don‚Äôt leave bad reviews, but I had a really disappointing experience at Melty. The food itself might be good, but the service I received ruined my visit. One of the employees, a male with dark grey hair, was extremely rude and disrespectful toward me. Instead of being welcoming or helpful, his attitude came across as dismissive and unprofessional, which made me feel very uncomfortable as a customer.

A place like this should pride itself not only on the food but also on the way they treat people, and unfortunately, that was completely lacking during my visit. I won‚Äôt be coming back, and I hope management takes this feedback seriously because no one should be treated that way when they‚Äôre just trying to enjoy a meal.

recommendations.title: Generate More Reviews
recommendations.description: Encourage satisfied customers to leave reviews
